entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
